Photo of the Day

Hong Kong Cityscape, China

Main Content

June 12, 2010

View Caption

« Previous

« Previous

Download Wallpaper (1600 x 1200 pixels)

June 12, 2010

Hong Kong Cityscape, China

Photograph by Ghani Khan, My Shot

This Month in Photo of the Day: Travel

A flash of red plies the nighttime waters of the South China Sea as shining skyscrapers mark the prosperity of Hong Kong. With seven million people living in its 426-square-mile (1,103-square-kilometer) region, the Asian megaport is one of the most densely populated areas in the world.


Photo Tip: Local architecture is an important part of any destination, but building shots tend to be dull. A dependable remedy, once again, is to compose with a compelling foreground element.

Get more photo tips »

See more photos of China »
